::Slayer::

Slayer nods, walking off toward the exit. He stops halway across the 
room, removing his battle suit and dropping it to the ground. The 
suit was useless because of its damage anyways, and would just make 
him slower.

"Allright, lets get going."

He flies out of the entrance, heading for the Maximal base.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ignatius snapped a new energizer to his talons. He knew that it 
would take
> as much power as he had to take on the Maximal army. Afterwards he 
pulled
> the mirror sensers and checked each one thoroughly. In a short time 
Ignatius
> stood poised for battle. At his side was a pack containing extra 
energy
> units, the mirror sensers, and the explosives needed to blow up the 
ridge.
> 
> "I'm set, let's move." Ignatius prided himself on his thorough 
attitude, he
> had the land memorized, the mirror sensers adjusted, and a full 
power unit
> in his weapons, he was ready for anything.
